title: Culture
heading: Remote Communication. One Culture
content:
Working as a team is only possible when communication flows.

Communication is much more than words.

SW Development is about formalizing knowledge. Doing it together as a team is all about communication. This has been the main failure on traditional off-shore attempts.

When working off-shore, remote communication is crucial. We have seen it working only when people talking across oceans and time-zones share a common culture.
